structure_sections.description: "İyi akşamlar Bugün 31 Ağustos cumartesi" - The opening of the broadcast where the presenter greets the audience and introduces the date and context of the program.

"Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan istanbul'daydı bugün" - The main content of the news broadcast, detailing President Erdoğan's participation in the Naval Academy diploma ceremony and discussing his statements on foreign policy and criticisms from the opposition.
"Bir de müjdesi vardı cumhurbaşkanının" - The closing remarks that summarize the key points discussed and provide a final note on the President's announcements, signaling the end of the news segment.
